name: Mobius 3i
headline: Compact fully-covered invisible loudspeaker
description: Most compact Mobius model for tight stud or joist spacing and cost-sensitive invisible audio, delivering clear natural performance with consistent Mobius voicing.
heroCopy: Compact scale, consistent voicing — fully covered for a seamless finish.
story: Mobius 3i is designed for projects with tight stud or joist spacing where a smaller panel is essential. Despite its compact footprint, it maintains the Mobius family’s signature clarity and openness, providing a coherent listening experience across multi-room installations. Fully covered behind a 2mm skim (or alternative finish), it preserves clean architectural surfaces while supporting reliable, natural background-to-medium level listening.
definition: Compact fully-covered invisible loudspeaker for distributed architectural audio.
finish: Fully-covered (2mm plaster skim or alternative finishes)

items.label: Fixing requirements
items.value: Backbox CV300 / SW300 or Mounting Blocks / Tab Mounting Kit

applications: Invisible audio installations with space limitations
Distributed audio and medium-level listening in residential projects (MDUs)

lifestyle.caption: A compact panel designed to disappear behind a 2mm skim, preserving clean lines while keeping voicing consistent across a project.
A refined low-profile build suited to tight stud spacing and shallow cavities—fully concealed once finished.

name: Mobius 5i
headline: High performance fully-covered loudspeaker
description: Versatile Mobius panel delivering signature clarity and openness for residential and commercial invisible audio systems.
heroCopy: The versatile core of Mobius — clarity and openness, fully covered.
story: Mobius 5i delivers the signature clarity and openness of the Mobius range in a balanced, versatile format. Designed to be fully covered behind a 2mm skim (or alternative finish), it integrates invisibly into walls and ceilings while supporting a wide range of residential and commercial distributed-audio applications. Ideal as the main workhorse panel for consistent performance across multiple zones.
definition: Versatile fully-covered invisible loudspeaker for premium distributed audio.
finish: Fully-covered (2mm plaster skim or alternative finishes)

items.label: Fixing requirements
items.value: Backbox CV345 / SW345 or Mounting Blocks / Tab Mounting Kit

lifestyle.caption: Balanced proportions for seamless plaster finishing—built to deliver Mobius openness without visual presence.

name: Mobius 5i / S200
headline: Slimline fully-covered loudspeaker
description: Slimline Mobius panel engineered for restricted spaces and gently curved walls or ceilings.
heroCopy: Slimline 200mm format — made for tight cavities and curved surfaces.
story: Mobius 5i / S200 is the slimline Mobius solution for constrained installations and gently curved surfaces. With a narrow 200mm width, it fits where standard panels cannot—supporting clean detailing in shallow stud walls, tight joist layouts, and curved architectural features. Fully covered behind a 2mm skim (or alternative finish), it maintains the Mobius family’s consistent voicing while enabling elegant, space-efficient integration.
definition: Slimline fully-covered invisible loudspeaker for restricted spaces and curved applications.
finish: Fully-covered (2mm plaster skim or alternative finishes)

items.label: Fixing requirements
items.value: Backbox CV200 / SW200 or Mounting Blocks / Tab Mounting Kit

lifestyle.caption: A slim 200mm format designed for constrained cavities and refined detailing where every millimetre matters.
A narrow silhouette suited to shallow walls and gentle curves—fully concealed once finished.

name: Mobius 7i
headline: Flagship fully-covered loudspeaker
description: Highest performance Mobius invisible loudspeaker with extended low-frequency reach and high output.
heroCopy: Flagship output and extension — fully concealed behind the finish.
story: Mobius 7i is the flagship of the Mobius range, engineered to deliver the greatest scale, dynamic range, and low-frequency reach from a fully concealed panel. Designed to be fully covered behind a 2mm skim (or alternative finish), it preserves architectural purity while supporting high-performance listening environments in premium residential and commercial projects.
definition: Flagship fully-covered invisible loudspeaker for high-output architectural audio systems.
finish: Fully-covered (2mm plaster skim or alternative finishes)

items.label: Fixing requirements
items.value: Backbox CV345 / SW345 or Mounting Blocks / Tab Mounting Kit

lifestyle.caption: Flagship scale engineered for high output—designed to remain visually silent behind the finish.
A refined build intended for confident performance and a seamless plaster finish.
Structural detailing designed to reduce resonance and support a more controlled presentation once installed.

name: MobiusDuali
headline: Dual-channel fully-covered loudspeaker
description: Single-panel stereo invisible loudspeaker for spaces where a stereo pair cannot be accommodated.
heroCopy: True dual-channel audio from one panel — a clean solution for compact rooms.
story: MobiusDuali delivers dual-channel (stereo) reproduction from a single invisible panel for spaces where two speakers are not feasible. It is designed to maintain even dispersion and strong intelligibility while keeping surfaces visually uninterrupted. Ideal for compact rooms, corridors, and distributed audio zones where simplicity and architectural discretion are priorities.
definition: Dual-channel fully-covered invisible loudspeaker for single-panel stereo installations.
finish: Fully-covered (2mm plaster skim or alternative finishes)

items.label: Fixing requirements
items.value: Backbox CV345 / SW345 or Mounting Blocks

applications: Rooms with insufficient space for a stereo pair
